summaries.title: Week 2 Recap: Staugler Stays Hot, Monroe Finds Momentum
summaries.content:
The second week of the Golden Tee League brought more fireworks as CJ Staugler continued his hot streak, following up last week’s 54 with a sharp 49 that kept him atop the leaderboard. Donny and Eric Sams held strong with matching totals, showing consistency that could pay off once handicaps kick in after week three.

Meanwhile, Brian Monroe shaved a few strokes off his debut score and hinted at a breakout week ahead. With players still adjusting to the greens and getting a feel for competition, the standings are tight — and the tension’s already building for next week’s round.
